== Varam (CT) (627237) ==

Varam (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 9.81 sq. km. and harbouring 3269 households with total population of 17008 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 538 km. Male population is 7661 and female population is 9347. Scheduled Caste population is 1480 and Scheduled Tribes population is 93. Census Location Code of the town is 627237<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 69 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 8 km.
